urls.title: Corporate SAF Programme | Corporate Social Responsibility | Cathay Pacific Corporate Sustainable Aviation Fuel Programme | Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Cathay Pacific’s Corporate Sustainable Aviation Fuel Programme is among the first in Asia to help corporate customers reduce their carbon emissions related to flight activities.

data.text:
Learn more about how we are leading the way to a more sustainable future with the business community: https://t.co/rlCvrRQKND

#GreenCathay #flygreener
#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond
Together with our corporate customers, we are working towards the goal of achieving net-zero carbon emissions by 2050.

To go far, we must go together. This April, we have launched Asia’s first major Corporate Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) Programme, introducing SAF for the first time in Hong Kong International Airport. https://t.co/JK7ibZdOwi

data.text: Enjoy fast, seamless, and stress-free check-ins before your flight to Hong Kong 🛫. Fly Ready lets you verify your COVID-19 test results and other required health documents in advance. That way, you can arrive at the airport ready to fly. https://t.co/yxnByqcHZu

“To everyone at Cathay Pacific, your professionalism and teamwork have inspired my crew and me to project the same when serving our passengers inflight. You’re all incredible. Thank you!” Sara says with pride.🎉

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond #CathayPeople

“I can feel the team spirit is always with us, especially when things are difficult,” Sara explains. One instance having to quarantine at Penny Bay during Christmas. Sara was immensely grateful that all the teams worked tirelessly to support and handle everything in her stead.

Meet Sara Chan, our Inflight Service Manager✈️ . As a mainstay at Cathay Pacific who has seen it all in her 31 years with us, Sara still embraces every flight and moment shared with her crew and the passengers. https://t.co/F4oW6nNCt7

Source: Cathay Pacific Sustainable Development Report, 2021

#GreenCathay #flygreener
#MoveBeyond #CathayPacific

urls.title: Sustainable development at Cathay Pacific | Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Cathay Pacific’s approach to sustainable development and climate change.

data.text: The only thing we love more than seeing our sustainability initiatives take flight, is sharing our progress and commitments with you. Discover how dedicated we are to leading the way for a sustainable future: https://t.co/Hxjcx5JdX0 https://t.co/5x4pk17v4H

Source: Cathay Pacific Sustainable Development Report, 2021

#GreenCathay #flygreener
#MoveBeyond #CathayPacific

Our inflight entertainment system offers so much! We look forward to welcoming you aboard again so you can experience it yourself!

Check it out here: https://t.co/diLiebmU84

data.text:
We can now help our customers go further with less carbon footprint, whether it’s for business travel or airfreight. Together, let's move towards a more sustainable future.​
​
Learn more and join us now: https://t.co/KEzRbQxJY0

#FlyGreener #GreenCathay #cathaypacific #MoveBeyond
We would like to thank the launch corporate customers and fuel suppliers. It’s through their joint efforts that SAF will be used in our aircraft at Hong Kong International Airport for the first time.

We’re proud to announce the launch of Asia’s first major Corporate Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) Programme. This programme has been one of our initiatives to make SAF account for 10% of our total fuel usage by 2030. https://t.co/BGJH4dhspe

Their significance is seen in the local culture, celebrating them as a symbol of fortune. Locals also revere elephants for their intelligence, unsurprising since ‘an elephant never forgets.’

“I truly believe that the power is within ourselves to activate change. We should never underestimate our own potential, and it is never too late to make new beginnings.” Says Christina. “It all starts with you!” 🌟
#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond

“I instantly knew that I could fly in the skies with the best of them.” Says Christina. With the support of her family and peers, she progressed through flight school and up the ranks, and now spends her days flying and sharing her own experiences with new trainees.

Meet the team - Second Officer Christina Ho. 👩‍✈️Christina joined Cathay Pacific initially as a flight attendant before serendipitously sitting in the flight deck and becoming enamoured and inspired to become a pilot. https://t.co/XWiPncHw2S

data.text:

Since the 1920s, neon signs have lit up Hong Kong’s urban culture ❇️. But it may surprise you to learn that most of them don’t use neon. After heating, bending, and charging the glass tubing, skilled artisans add neon gas or argon-mercury mixes. https://t.co/CDB2fWHOj9

data.text: We’re introducing Fly Ready: a convenient way to upload your COVID-19 test results and other required health documents before your flight to Hong Kong.
